title: Wifi setting caused my Pixel 4a to keep restarting itself
content:
Hello, I'm from Singapore and there's a free wifi network that we can connect to called Wireless@SGx. The set-up is just to set the EAP method to SIM. However, after setting up the wifi network on my pixel 4a, it restarted itself multiple times.
I temporarily remedied the problem by resetting the network settings using "settings app --> system --> reset options". The phone works fine after the reset. 
I have recently tried to connect to the network again and my phone restarted itself again multiple times. Please help/advise what I should do 🙇🏻‍♂️🙇🏻‍♂️ Thank you.
